name: Avoid using Spring Security in combination with Spring Framework 5.0.5
description: This rule will check the spring framework version and the use of Spring Security by enabling global method security
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale:
An unauthorized malicious user can gain unauthorized access to methods that should be restricted.

Using method security of Spring security with Spring Framework 5.0.5.release, an authorization bypass may occur which leads to unauthorized access to malicious user.
remediation: Upgrade to Spring Security 5.0.5.RELEASE+ or Spring Boot 2.0.2.RELEASE+ brings in Spring Framework 5.0.6.RELEASE+
total: Number of XML Files and Java Classes
alternativeName: Ensure you have used Spring framework with version greater than 5.0.5 when enabling global security method

technicalCriteria.name: OWASP-2013-A7 Missing Function Level Access Control

qualityStandards.name: Improper Authorization
qualityStandards.description: The software does not perform or incorrectly performs an authorization check when an actor attempts to access a resource or perform an action.

qualityStandards.name: Broken Access Control
qualityStandards.description: Restrictions on what authenticated users are allowed to do are often not properly enforced. Attackers can exploit these flaws to access unauthorized functionality and/or data, such as access other users' accounts, view sensitive files, modify other users' data, change access rights, etc.

qualityStandards.name: Missing Function Level Access Control
qualityStandards.description: Most web applications verify function level access rights before making that functionality visible in the UI. However, applications need to perform the same access control checks on the server when each function is accessed. If requests are not verified, attackers will be able to forge requests in order to access functionality without proper authorization.
